video_play_actions.description: number of times your video starts to play

video_3_sec_watched_actions.description: number of times your video played at the 3 seconds mark, including plays that skipped to this point

video_10_sec_watched_actions.description: number of times your video played at the 10 seconds mark, including plays that skipped to this point

video_p25_watched_actions.description: number of times your video was played at 25% of its length, including plays that skipped to this point

video_p50_watched_actions.description: number of times your video was played at 50% of its length, including plays that skipped to this point

video_p75_watched_actions.description: number of times your video was played at 75% of its length, including plays that skipped to this point

video_p95_watched_actions.description: number of times your video was played at 95% of its length, including plays that skipped to this point

video_p100_watched_actions.description: number of times your video was played at 100% of its length, including plays that skipped to this point
